title: Missing character in DefaultSimilarity's javadoc
description: The part which describes precision loss of norm values is missing a character; the encoded input value 0.89 in the example will actually be decoded to 0.875, not 0.75.

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Thanks András Péteri you are correct, I'll add a test and commit.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1664687 from Michael McCandless in branch 'dev/trunk'

LUCENE-6343: DefaultSimilarity javadocs has the wrong example for encode/decode precision loss
